meanings.definition: The process of spalling or breaking off in small pieces.
meanings.sent1: The spallations of the rock created a pile of small pieces.
meanings.sent2: During the earthquake, the spallations of the building caused debris to scatter everywhere.
meanings.sent3: The spallations of the cookie as I bit into it made a mess on the table.
meanings.sent4: The spallations of the glass under pressure resembled a beautiful shattered mosaic.
meanings.sent5: The spallations of the bark from the tree trunk revealed the fresh wood underneath.

meanings.definition: The act of spalling or breaking off in small pieces.
meanings.sent1: I heard the loud spallations of the metal as it hit the ground.
meanings.sent2: The spallations of the paint from the wall revealed the old color underneath.
meanings.sent3: The spallations of the ice cube as it melted made a small puddle on the table.
meanings.sent4: The spallations of the clay sculpture gave it a unique textured look.
meanings.sent5: The spallations of the old book cover showed its age and wear.
